snippet: New work by the Italian Conceptual sculptor Paola Pivi at Galerie Perrotin. Works by Lucio Fontana, Yves Klein and Cy Twombly at Dominique Lévy.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews new works by Italian Conceptual sculptor Paola Pivi at Galerie Perrotin and group show called Audible Presence at Dominique Levy gallery.
lead_paragraph: New work by the Italian Conceptual sculptor Paola Pivi at Galerie Perrotin. Works by Lucio Fontana, Yves Klein and Cy Twombly at Dominique Lévy.

headline.main: Paola Pivi: ‘Ok, you are better than me, so what?’; ‘Audible Presence’
headline.print_headline:
Paola Pivi: ‘Ok, you are better than me,
so what?’ | 'Audible Presence’
